metadata.synopsis:
Bone sculptures that Ketheric have built when turning to Myrkul during his containment in Thorm's mausoleum. Since he used material at hand some if not many of these are actually Thorm family members of the past generations.

This one looks like a dozen or so skulls connected together in a circle with bones like candles sticking from the top.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The ancestors of Ketheric Thorm, arranged into macabre totems - but why?*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *A totem dedicated to Myrkul. Ketheric Thorm ransacked the graves of his ancestors to honour his new god.*

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *Ancient bones, disturbed from their final rest to form a bizarre sort of artwork. But by who, and why?*
